src.nu_osc.hamiltonians.evolution_operator_3nu#

src.nu_osc.hamiltonians.evolution_operator_3nu(hamiltonian_matrix, L)[source]#

Returns the 3nu time-evolution operator in its SU(3) expanstion.

Returns the three-neutrino time-evolution operator U3(L) in its exponential SU(3) expansion U3(L) = u0*I + i*u_k*lambda^k. This is a 3x3 unitary matrix.

Parameters:

  • hamiltonian_matrix (list) – 3x3 Hamiltonian, [[H11,H12,H13],[H21,H22,H23],[H31,H32,H33]].

  • L (float) – Baseline.

Returns:

The U3(L) time-evolution operator, a 3x3 unitary complex matrix.

Return type:

list

Example

>>> hamiltonian_matrix = [
...                   [1.0+0.0j, 0.0+2.0j, 0.0-1.0j],
...                   [0.0-2.0j, 3.0+0.0j, 3.0+0.0j],
...                   [0.0+1.0j, 3.0-0.0j, -5.0+0.0j]
... ]
>>> L = 1.0
>>> U3 = evolution_operator_3nu(hamiltonian_matrix, L)
>>> print(U3)
[[ 0.312551-0.495018j -0.374011+0.523265j  0.170201-0.463257j]
 [ 0.374011-0.523265j -0.051331-0.047068j -0.384525+0.65848j ]
 [-0.170201+0.463257j -0.384525+0.65848j  -0.173265+0.380716j]]
